name: Sombrio Crank Pro Bib Shorts - Men's
description: All-day comfort that won’t shift around when you are out crushing single-track. These bib shorts feature a premium chamois to add extra comfort in the saddle. Super stretchy and hell-yeah comfy, just throw on and go.Square mesh bib dries quickly and breathes well.Ergonomic patterning combines two types of material for great breathability and mobility.Elevation Pro chamois improves comfort in the saddle.Low-profile triple density padding has strategically placed ultra-high-density foam.Chamois uses perforated foam for increased breathability.Low-profile seams reduce irritation.Base layer fit.
